entry.title: Hello, Friends
entry.content: Welcome to my blog. This is my very first post. My current main research interests focus on human-computer interaction(using LLMs), human mesh recovery, and NeRF. Regarding the above, Iâ€™ll be updating my thoughts periodically and welcome any interested friends to join me in discussing~
